channel.title: Text Based Game
channel.description:
(Exact copy of my thread on MoparScape, I just wanted to see how it fared against your standards too)
Made by me, I'd like to see what you all think of it. Controls are on the link. There is a place to use the 'move' command, and it does unlock a new place, but I'm not telling you where.
Pretty basic at the moment, gotta expand the map, and I'm considering incorporating one of the books where it says things like 'if you do this, turn to page 95' etc into it, as I think it would be rather fun.
Ah well, here you go:
http://www.farout-rp.com/java/textgame/
I'm also looking for someone to design the map for me (as in, make a layout and ill put it into the game)

item.title: Text Based Game
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

ranger squad:

[quote author=board description]If you’re interested in RuneScape hacking, you should be interested in Java. Learn, teach, discuss Java and its techniques, and post your Java source code.

I am discussing it.[/quote]Learn, teach, discuss Java and its techniques, and post your Java source code.
You are not doing any of those. You’re discussing your game, not Java itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Text Based Game
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:10, topic:383700”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=479468.msg3512070#msg3512070 date=1298659109]
Why am I in the wrong section? I posted a Java project in the Java section.
[/quote]
You posted a Java project in the Java programming section.
If I understand it right, this section is for programming issues and not for posting games you have made in Java.[/quote]
How is this section dedicated to Java issues? Surely, as you pointed it out it’s for Java programming. So really that means anything related to java?

Read full topic

@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:7, topic:383700”]I used Java because it is the language I am most experienced with, why would I use anything else that would take me longer to get to the same stage?

And yes, I know it’s unclean at the moment, but I am more interested in functionality and content than aesthetics for the time being.[/quote]
You’re in the wrong section then.
